subject: College Athletics
Basketball (College)
Murders and Attempted Murders
Colleges and Universities
lead_paragraph: Shanterrica Madden stands accused of killing her roommate, Tina Stewart, who played basketball at Middle Tennessee State.There are no answers, just a world of sorrow.
